content.raw:
This seems decent! I’m content not using an Enum since you want to be able to include tooltips and things like that, so they’re not super flexible.

I’ll get rid of the f string for token Python2 compat, and change the copyright to “Monash University and contributors” and merge.

We can fix any issues that arise later, since this is just a widget that no code will be using unless it opts in.

Thanks David.

‌
content.html:
This seems decent! I’m content not using an Enum since you want to be able to include tooltips and things like that, so they’re not super flexible.

I’ll get rid of the f string for token Python2 compat, and change the copyright to “Monash University and contributors” and merge.

We can fix any issues that arise later, since this is just a widget that no code will be using unless it opts in.

Thanks David.

‌
